issue.title: [C++] Add Arrow memory benchmark for Arm64
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7465](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7465). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the memory benchmark is implemented just for x86 (memory_benchmark.cc).

The task is to add the memory benchmark for Arm64.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7465?focusedCommentId=17014751) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6092
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6092>
